title: Castle Clinton National Monument: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours          Free guided tours are available to the public Monday through Sunday at 10:00 AM, 12:00 AM, 2:00 PM,and 4:00 PM. The schedule is subject to staff availability. No reservation is necessary. A History of the Castle This 20-minute Park Ranger-guided tour illustrates the colorful history of Castle Clinton, including how it has served as a fort, entertainment center, immigration depot, and aquarium.
